metadata.title: CVE-2024-0804 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in iOS Security UI in Google Chrome priorto 121.0.6167.85 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
